title: Variable Swap
description: Declare two integer variables, swap their values, and print the result.
instructions: Create two variables a=5 and b=10. Swap their values using a temporary variable and print 'a=10, b=5'.

hints.text: You need a temporary variable to hold one value during the swap
Use var (not val) since values will change
Store a in temp, assign b to a, assign temp to b

commonMistakes.correction: Use var for variables that will change
Store one value in a temp variable first
Use $a and $b in the string template
